implementations.title: VC Investment Memo System
implementations.challenge: Manual review of investment documents is time-consuming and inconsistent
implementations.solution: Automated document extraction from data rooms, structured analysis across 9 key dimensions, standardized output format for team review, integration with deal tracking systems
implementations.technologies: Claude Sonnet 4, Google Cloud, n8n, Airtable

implementations.title: Startup Email Intelligence
implementations.challenge: Founders drowning in inbound opportunities and unable to prioritize
implementations.solution: AI classification: Known Contact, Referral, Investment Opportunity, Uncertain, Irrelevant. Automated folder organization in Gmail, context-aware response generation, automatic CRM entry creation, thank-you note automation for referrers

implementations.title: Founder Discovery Engine
implementations.challenge: Identifying and reaching promising founders is manual and time-intensive
implementations.solution: Weekly automated research based on investment thesis, initial validation and company scoring, personalized outreach email generation, event and news monitoring, draft placement in email for review before sending

differentiators: Iterative improvement based on real usage
Custom GPT documentation for all workflows
No vendor lock-in - you own everything

features: Structured commands only for outbound data
No LLM training on proprietary data
security.bestFor: Highly sensitive VC data, confidential R&D

features: Secure API connectors for all I/O
Enterprise LLM plans with no-training guarantees

about.company: Founded by Doug Sutcliffe, former Director of Data Driven Marketing at L'Oréal US and CRM & Data Science Product Manager at L'Oréal Canada, Lightspeed Labs brings enterprise-grade AI expertise to forward-thinking organizations.
about.approach: We combine deep technical knowledge with proven business transformation experience. With an agile methodology that delivers usable results every two weeks, we help clients implement AI workflows that actually work, not just look impressive in PowerPoint.
experience: Specialized in AI deployment and data architecture
Published in Entrepreneur, Tech Times, HackerNoon, and more
Network of 20+ specialized consultants for scaled projects
about.callout: We're a boutique firm that can scale. Solo founder for close partnership, with access to specialized talent when your project demands it.
